info.title: Optical RFID Tag

orfid.tag.name: orfid.tag
orfid.tag.description: The Property "tagid" is an integer showing the currently read optical augmented RFID tag's identity information.

tagid.name: tagid
tagid.description: The tag read by the RFID reader.

reading.name: reading
reading.description: The reading indication. true: the tagid is read e.g. being valid. false: the tagid is invalid.
